articles.content: Update: Phil Spencer and Major Nelson have replied to fans asking about the transition to Facebook Gaming. On Twitter, Spencer was asked about streaming using other apps, to which he replied: "Yes, w… [+5346 chars]

articles.author: James O'Connor
articles.title: The Last Of Us Part 2 Writers Have Discussed The Scenes And Ideas They Cut (SPOILERS) - GameSpot
articles.description: The Last of Us Part II is a long game with a lot of ideas--but it turns out that quite a few other aspects of the game were cut before release.
articles.content:
WARNING: this article will SPOIL PLOT DETAILS for The Last of Us Part II. If you don't want the plot spoiled, turn away now.
